modName: TM Thalmor Overhaul and follower clones
summary: Replacer for main Thalmor NPCs and follower clones
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://jpegshare.net/images/51/e4/51e449cb35c18253dc889ca5bd831204.png[/img]
[font=Kalinga][size=3]I like Thalmor and I like making NPC replacers so I decided to improve this guys a little. This mod improves Elenwen, Rulindil, Ondolemar, Ancano, Ancarion and Estormo. Mod comes in two versions: only NPC replacer and NPC replacer + follower clones with the same look.[/size]

[size=3]Main features:[/size]
[size=3]• Mod is fully standalone with its own everything (except bodies)[/size]
[size=3]• Face textures[/size]
[size=3]• New hairstyles for everyone[/size]
[size=3]• High poly heads[/size]
[size=3]• New armors with high quality textures[/size]


[size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/67/ae/67ae00bd8260cb5247b134b377151d9e.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]This mod requires Dragonborn DLC and SKSE (besauce of high resolution warpaints. SKSE is not critically needed but without it warpains will look pixelated).Â I recommend manual installation. Choose the version you like, unpack the archive and place files to your Data folder, activate TMThalmorOverhaul.esp in the launcher.[/size]

[size=3]You may find follower clones in Solitude Castle Dour, Thalmor Headquarters. Please note that this mod is actually a roleplay thing and this followers are not for everyone. You can hire them only if you're a Thalmor member. You can do it via console, use [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32828/]Aldmeri Dominion Strengthened[/url][size=3] or [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/]Alternate start[/url][size=3].[/size]


[b][color=#e06666][size=4]COMPATIBILITY & KNOWN ISSUES
[/size][/color][/b][size=3]• Sometime the followers don't appear in the place where they should be. I don't know why on earth this bug pops up but I've experienced it myself many times. Other save file or moving the mod in load order, tick/untick/tick it sometime helps.
• The names of locations touched by my mod may look like some strange symbols. It's because my game is not in English and I have very complicated relationships with translation program, sorry.[/size]
[size=3]• I myself don't use any unofficial patches, gameplay effects or whatever such stuff so I can't say anything about how they'll work together. Follower framework overhauls like UFO are fine.[/size]
[size=3]• Concerning EEO users: this replaced NPCs and their follower clones probably will not be affected by EEO because they use their own head model and EEO uses its own one as well.[/size]


[size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/10/28/10281bcb4846d88a4625ba73f33e8111.png[/img][/size]
[b][color=#ffe599]- I don't like this/I don't like that/can you change the things how I want/can you make separate mod for each NPC?[/color][/b]
[size=3]- No.[/size]

[b][color=#ffe599]- I want their original voices for that follower clones![/color][/b]
[size=3]- This is technically impossible because their original voices don't have voiced lines which you need for follower dialogues so I had to use the voices which have such functions.[/size]

[b][color=#ffe599]- Can you make this followers be able to be hired by everyone?[/color][/b]
[size=3]- No.[/size]

[b][color=#ffe599]- Are they marriageable?[/color][/b]
[size=3]- No, they're on duty.[/size]


[size=3][img]http://jpegshare.net/images/5d/ba/5dbad71e3f710f8dccf5b592edf9c2fd.png[/img][/size]
[size=3]Erik for [/size][url=https://anvilbay.net/files/skyrim-highpoly-heads/]Skyrim HighPoly Heads[/url]
[size=3]Maevan2 for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986]Mature skin[/url]
[size=3]Geonox for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4141]High res face maps for men[/url]
[size=3]Xenius for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29977/]XCE - Warpaint and Dirt[/url]
[size=3]Halendia for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30823]Iridum eyes[/url]
[size=3]Apachii for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]
[size=3]Kalilies, Stealthic Khaos and Shocky [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/]KS Hairdos[/url]
[size=3]Jethead for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25636/]Jethead armors[/url]
[size=3]Cabal120 for [/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23125/]aMidianBorn Elven armor retexture[/url]
[size=3]Nikinoodles for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]
Nightshade for Thalmor robe retexture & helmets <3[/size][/font]
author: Aisaka aka TevinterMage
